pageContext.claim: “More manufacturing jobs in fact were created in 2018 than in the year in more than 21 years.”
pageContext.analysis: This fact is correct but lacks context. A sustained decline in manufacturing jobs started in 1998 until it bottomed out during the Great Recession. Since 2010, the number of manufacturing jobs has increased each year but it still has not reached the level before the start of the Great Recession in December, 2007. The number of manufacturing jobs at the time of this statement was still about 900,000 jobs below the level in December, 2007.
